text:
@realDonaldTrump I’ll say what everyone else is thinking. Where are the tests, Dummy?

How can we effectively Flatten The Curve in our country if we don’t know who are the #COVIDー19 carriers? #FlattenTheCurve #coronavirus #WhereAreTheTestKits
